HomePage.welcomeSubtitle: Powerful and easy-to-use online graphic design application. Create amazing designs with thousands of templates, professional editing tools and rich resource library.
HomePage.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Continue creating amazing designs.
HomePage.easyDesignDesc: Intuitive interface with simple drag and drop. No design experience needed to create professional works.
HomePage.richTemplatesDesc: Thousands of beautiful templates for every purpose: posters, logos, banners, cards, social media and more.
HomePage.professionalToolsDesc: Powerful editing toolkit with effects, filters, typography and advanced design features.
